entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:26 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 10:26 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
